name: CbcStrategy
brief: Strategy pattern for configuring CbcModel components

algorithms.name:
Strategy Pattern for B&C Configuration
Copyright (C) 2005, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcStrategy provides a strategy pattern for bundling solver configuration.
Subclasses define complete solving strategies by implementing:
- setupCutGenerators(): Configure cutting plane generators
- setupHeuristics(): Configure primal heuristics
- setupPrinting(): Configure output/logging
- setupOther(): Strong branching, preprocessing, etc.

Supports nested models (depth_) and preprocessing state tracking.
